website_summaries.verdict: A big, powerful unit with a dependable manufacturer and parts contributor.
pros: Quality is assured by KitchenAid's reputation and some InSinkErator components
cons: The collar that keeps the noise in also makes it a bit difficult to feed in waste

customer_reviews.title: Wide and quiet
customer_reviews.text: OMG, I can barely hear this thing running! It's so quiet. I love it. Installation was typical of any other disposal. Be aware that for installation you'll need two additional items: plumbers putty or silicone and an electrical cord (unless you can reuse your existing one). Due to the extra sound insulation it's a bit wider than most other disposals, so consider the space under your sink before deciding on this one. YouTube has great installation videos of you're inclined to install yourself. It's easy. You should definitely NOT pay someone to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Williams Family

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Had it installed three days ago; it was a replacement for a four-year-old KitchenAid of the same HP. It is markedly quieter. The only thing I'd suggest is that KitchenAid make a brushed nickel sink insert instead of the shiny chrome. As for Standard Plumbing Supply, the item came a few days sooner than I was to expect, so kudos to them. Item was well packed. Caveat: be sure to remove the plug on the unit before you're finished installing, or you'll have a mess. :)
customer_reviews.author: I. Candy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: So far I found this disposal to be quiet, efficient and great. It was much better than the one that I had that came with the house when I bought it. I am very pleased with it. I would definitely recommend it. It was an easy installation and I'm very glad that I decided on this one. It was a little more expensive than other ones, of course, but I don't regret it at all. I personally think it was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Wurzelbacher

customer_reviews.title: Extremely quiet, easy install, works great, no issues
customer_reviews.text: This was a great addition to our kitchen remodel. It installed easily in our new sink, and came with all the necessary hardware to tie into our plumbing. Though our existing plumbing had to be modified, due to farmhouse sink. One reason I went with this model is, it is a little shorter then competitors model in this price/sound range. Which we needed given the farmhouse sink already cost us a few inches. We actually still have over 6" tonthe cabinet. It is extremely quiet, you can't really hear it over the running water once food has been "disposed". Seems to dispose of food very well too! Have been using now for a few months with no issues!
customer_reviews.author: D. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality product.  Nice.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 5 stars for my rating, as it is a very nice, quality product. For noise level, I also gave it 5 stars, meaning it has a very LOW noise level, not high (not clear how the rating is to work on that one). I didn't install it, but the person who did had no trouble. It is very powerful and quiet. It is a highly rated model by consumer testing groups as well.
customer_reviews.author: TechnoBob

customer_reviews.title: Great disposal for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great garbage disposal with the legendary KitchenAid quality. Instructions were easy to follow, but you’ll need to make a trip to the store to get plumbers caulk if you don’t have any as it’s not included. Runs quiet and makes mincemeat of anything I’ve put into it.
customer_reviews.author: CodeView

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Quiet
customer_reviews.text: So glad I replaced an old Badger 1/2 HP disposal with this KitchenAid 3/4 HP disposal! I no longer have to cut lemon rinds into small pieces before disposing of them, or put some vegetable peels/leaves in garbage can because they might clog the old disposal. Be sure to follow the sequence of steps in the instructions! (My handyman did not read the instructions first, so it look him longer to do the install because he did the steps in the wrong order.) This disposal is very quiet. Now I can run it at night, even when someone in the house is sleeping. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chickadee

customer_reviews.title: Great product easy install
customer_reviews.text: Saved over 100 dollars by installing myself! Very good product installation directions and pretty easy install if you are patient and like to follow directions. Works great! So much quieter than my old disposal. Really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably Quiet...
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our 20 year old in sink erator when the kitchen was renovated. I chose this one because reviews raved about the low noise level. I can't believe how much quieter this unit is compared to our old one. Sometimes you can't even tell it's running... so incredibly quiet! When it's so quiet you wonder if it's doing its job. So far no bad smells coming so I assume it's working well even though I don't hear the awful grinding noises that I was used to!
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet disposal! Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a Moen disposal, but it was so loud that you couldn't hold a conversation. With the KitchenAid you can talk to someone in the room or on the phone or watch TV and you can barely hear this 3/4 HP unit grinding away. A great purchase. I had bought a Moen, but it sounded like a malfunctioning jet engine. So, I exchanged it for a KitchenAid unit, which is extremely quiet! The KitchenAid is so quite that you can have a phone call conversation standing next to it or with someone across the room.
customer_reviews.author: JonG

customer_reviews.title: Not as quiet.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because of reviews saying how very quiet it is... I almost expected not to even hear it running. Not so. Well made, food is gone in a matter of seconds. I had it installed and the gentlemen did not have any issues. It is NOT whisper quiet. Better than my old one and I’m sure it will last. I don’t think any garbage disposal is quiet...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, effective, a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: It's a little pricey but it's surprisingly quiet and compact, and quickly makes short work if anything you put in it. I'm hoping the price reflects durability and quality, I'm tired of the rotating replacement of Insinkerator junk.
customer_reviews.author: Trekboi

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Easily DIY installation. No rust with stainless steel interior. Runs super quiet. Too bad it didn't come with built in power cord to just plug-in. Had to spend extra money for the power cord, and then the extra time to connect.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Installed and been working for 3 months now
customer_reviews.text: It is the quietest disposal I have ever had! And I love the stopper as it has a feature to let water drain from the sink only if you want to not use the disposal and compost what is in the sink. When I am peeling shrimp I love this feature.
customer_reviews.author: gso1

customer_reviews.title: Quiet unit and easy installation. Like it very much.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an Insinkerator unit. Easy to install with only minor pipe adjustments. I was even able to reuse the old electrical pigtail. Some of you may need to purchase a electrical pigtail to fit your hookup. Took about an hour to complete. As advertised it is quieter than old unit and does a good grinding job.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Sloterdijk

customer_reviews.title: Efficient
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY LIKE THIS PRODUCT, IT WAS A LITTLE MORE EXPENSIVE THAT MY PREVIOUS DISPOSAL BUT IS SO WORTH THE DIFFERENCE IN PRICE! PERFORMS WITH EXCELLENCE.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Salisbury

customer_reviews.title: Whisper Quiet...
customer_reviews.text: VERY quiet...and that's the maint reason I replaced my old Insinkerator 777. The KitchenAid does have a little low frequency vibration(I think they all have some)...but it's negligible. I researched this purchase on Consumer Reports. This unit was the best rating combination of quiet, effective, and low price. Would have given it five stars if were better balanced...but I'd buy the same model again...REALLY quiet!
customer_reviews.author: Mr D

customer_reviews.title: Kitchenaide Quality, Powerful, Quiet, Easy to Install.
customer_reviews.text: Although the garbage disposal has not been installed yet, the biggest disappointment is that it did not come with the electrical cord nor the dishwasher connection kit. And no, these are not “readily available at your local hardware store”, at least not for Kitchen-aide I found these items for Insinkerator, but not Kitchenaide. There was no indication on the Insinkerator accessories these items would work on the Kitchenaide disposal.
customer_reviews.author: H.Clayton

customer_reviews.title: VERY PLEASED WITH THIS DISPOSAL
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet. Efficient. Easy to install. Very pleased with this disposal.
customer_reviews.author: G Bragg

customer_reviews.title: Quiet REALLY means Quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Woah...when they mean quiet, they do mean quiet. This almost makes you feel uncomfortable because you THINK it is not working, but it is. Totally amazing. Ha...I don't like getting use to the rubber seal ( gateway for food to enter the disposal) ( which is new) because most old ones are so worn out your food just falls right in.... No worries, it will wear out in time same as all disposals. I love it and kitchen aid is a really great product
customer_reviews.author: RobbieL

customer_reviews.title: CR recommended
customer_reviews.text: We got this because it was the highest recommended CR disposer unit. It installed easily, works well and is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S. Pearlman

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and efficient disposal
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best disposals I have ever used. It is relatively quiet and does a good job of grinding up the garbage materials.
customer_reviews.author: SLS

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s Job and easy install. Direct replacement.
customer_reviews.text: This was a direct replacement of the KitchenAid unit that was originally installed when we built our home 20 years ago. Fit with no extra work. Works great and is so quite- just does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D. Steele

customer_reviews.title: Quiet for sure
customer_reviews.text: Actually so quiet that even during heavy grinding I wonder if its working correctly because of how quiet it is. We've had for about a year in the kitchen and it works very well. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Love this garbage disposal works great and its very quiet. I researched the product and I am content that I made the right choice.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bello

customer_reviews.title: more powerful and quiet compared to older KitchenAid
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a 20-year-old KitchenAid with this one. The power is impressive, but the quiet is even more impressive. It will grind up eggshells and you can barely hear it outside the kitchen. So far it feels like money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Hampton

customer_reviews.title: It’s quiet!
customer_reviews.text: I received this in a couple of days, and it’s quiet. So much so, it tough to tell when it’s grinding and when it’s done. Which, for me, is wonderful 🙂 The instructions are detailed enough I could have installed it myself, perfect for a DYI’er. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: CD1

customer_reviews.title: This has been great for me for years.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for three years now. It is still super quiet. It has always been reliable. And I could install it myself (I'm handy but I'm not a plumber).
customer_reviews.author: anotherone

customer_reviews.title: Quieter than expected
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a quiet disposal and it is worth the extra price. Installation was easy, it would have been nice to have at least the cable connector included (power cord would also have been nice) with this as I had to make a trip to my local hardware store to get the cable connector.
customer_reviews.author: Polly A Brooks

customer_reviews.title: This disposer had the best of all worlds
customer_reviews.text: Quiet Quiet Quiet and STRONG! This disposer had the best of all worlds. No wonder Consumer Reports rates it Number One!
customer_reviews.author: tomm888

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Quiet!
customer_reviews.text: I've used middle to high end models from the mainstream brands in my previous house and rental units, but this KitchenAid model is by far the best I've installed and used. The unit is powerful, but also the quietest I've use. Not a lot of hours on it yet, but so far it's exceeding expectations.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: super good.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Kitchen Aid is still the best out there!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: It’s quiet!!
customer_reviews.text: We love it. It’s so quiet! We had our last one for more than 20 years. They’ve made it a lot better since then. 🤓. Great job. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Disposer
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Some of the other reviews discussed how quite it is. I was not that impressed. However, it was quieter than the original disposer.
customer_reviews.author: RANDALL C

customer_reviews.title: Kitchenaid ... never disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the 10th Kitchenaid product I've bought in the last 10 years. Refridgerators, dishwahsers, disposals, pans, ... I've never been disappointed. This disposal is no different. Smooth, quiet, efficient. Was a breeze to install in a very small place. Only complaint is the cheap-o plastic cover and that's just being picky.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dunn

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER
customer_reviews.text: It is the best garbage disposal EVER. Totally worth the money. Super quiet. The only con is the drainage lip (black thing around the drain) has to be used. If you use anything else, it gives the sink the an earthquake effect. *can't be good for the parts! So the draining is super slow when you have a sink full of water. But I'm okay with it!
customer_reviews.author: Nikole

customer_reviews.title: chews it up and spits it out
customer_reviews.text: This is my second kitchen aid disposer , my first one lasted 32 years and was still working when we remodeled the kitchen ,so I did not hesitate to buy another , the installation was easy and the electrical hook up was simple . this disposer is much quieter than my previous one . To make a long story short I am extremely satisfied and Yes i would buy it again and again.Quality does cost a little more but this could be the last one you will ever need to buy.
customer_reviews.author: David Frisbee

customer_reviews.title: Whisper Quiet
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the quietest, most efficient, disposers that I have experienced!
customer_reviews.author: TWJ

customer_reviews.title: and I am very satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit October 2015. It arrived promptly and very well packaged, with very clear instructions. The unit is quiet and powerful and not that difficult to install. I chose to power it with appliance cord to a newly installed GFCI under-sink outlet. It works very well, and I am very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ruddyscots

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet! Be sure to order the separate power cord. It doesn’t come with one, and I missed that fact.
customer_reviews.author: A. Neel

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to install. Runs great. The rubber flange does slow down the drainage from the sink, but also will keep out those accidental spoons and wash cloths that led to the demise of our last disposal.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S. Steffen

customer_reviews.title: Easy isntallation
customer_reviews.text: Only 2 cups of coffee and just on trip to the hardware store. About 2 and a half hours start to finish. Very quiet unit and very effective. Reccomend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: William McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Great Garbage Disposal!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced another KitchenAid garbage disposal that was 13 years old. It turns out, I had an electrical problem and it did not need to replace the old garbage disposal. But given its age, and the need to replace the faucet anyway, I decided to replace it. the new one one grinds well and it's actually much more quiet. I am pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: D. T. Winkler

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It runs so much quieter than my old Kenmore. Very happy so far!
customer_reviews.author: Diane P.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet. Powerful. Larger than the one it replaced ...
customer_reviews.text: Quiet. Powerful. Larger than the one it replaced - but worth taking up the space.
customer_reviews.author: Charliecopter

customer_reviews.title: Really quiet
customer_reviews.text: Very stout construction, extremely quiet. We rlaced our old Badger unit and this mounted right onto the existing locking bracket/ring. Was pretty easy to install. make sure to measure your available space, this sucker took up quite a bit more room, but has been definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quiet disposal!
customer_reviews.text: Basic garbage disposal. Took about 1 hour for the plumbers to install; works great and very, very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Marty W

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install and is amazingly quiet. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry W Morris

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, Works Well. Just what i needed for a garbage disposal.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet disposal
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this disposal. I selected this after reading the Consumer Reports review. It's incredibly quiet and has been effective with normal food. We haven't tried anything too tough with it, but it seems to do a great job with daily use.
customer_reviews.author: K. Pate

customer_reviews.title: Very good item
customer_reviews.text: It is quiet and thoroughly grinds up food. The company was very quick to fill the order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and effective
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe just how quiet this garbage disposal is. I wish we would have upgraded a long time ago!
customer_reviews.author: jkf

customer_reviews.title: Peacefully quiet
customer_reviews.text: So quiet that I thought the electricians had forgotten to hook it up or the disposal was defective. Neither. Just super quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Pattsi

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: New kitchen and new disposer, looks great and quiet 🤗.
customer_reviews.author: victor kostainsek

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement disposal!
customer_reviews.text: This product has worked well for us. I installed it by myself though with a little bit of difficulty. It has worked flawlessly since. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: dpc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This order was received on time and we love it, noise level is exceptional and price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: EdGeerl

customer_reviews.title: Garbage disposal works efficiently and quietly
customer_reviews.text: My old garbage disposal stopped working. The new one, (similar to my old one) was installed and works great. It’s quiet and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Meagher

customer_reviews.title: My son installed in an hour and it works and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Rated highest in consumer report and I can see why. So quiet-I thought it was broke at first lol. My son installed in an hour and it works and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Judy in Michigan

customer_reviews.title: kitchen aid - looks good, sounds good, acts good
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet. Chews up most anything quickly. Easy install for plumber. Sturdy build. All metal - no plastic. Now to see if it lasts forever as expected... Higher price would anticipate that.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ford

customer_reviews.title: Easy install as replacement
customer_reviews.text: Very easily installed by husband. Extremely quiet!! It has handled everything I put in it without any difficulty. I am amazed how quietly it runs!
customer_reviews.author: J. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Best disposal by far
customer_reviews.text: You will never realize what a QUIET disposal is until you buy this KitchenAide !! I highly recommend this disposal.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Whisper quiet
customer_reviews.text: This is the quietest garbage disposal I've ever not-quite-heard. I am very happy I got it. And of course it grinds food very well and pretty quickly. I can't compare its speed to competitors but I am quite satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wick

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly quiet!!
customer_reviews.text: very happy with this disposal - strong & it doesn't sound like it's disposing of itself when grinding garbage!
customer_reviews.author: KJaz

customer_reviews.title: Extremely quiet!
customer_reviews.text: This disposal is extremely quiet which is just wonderful! It exceeds my expectations which are high because I am a huge fan of Kitchen Aid products. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: ann yingling

customer_reviews.title: I have used Kitchen Aide products for years. Every ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used Kitchen Aide products for years. Every property I acquire I always put in at least a 3/4hp Kitchen Aide disposal and have never experienced a problem with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... bigger than I expected but seems to be working fine and is fairly quiet
customer_reviews.text: It's bigger than I expected but seems to be working fine and is fairly quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Plumber installed easily. Pleasantly surprised it seemed significantly quieter than the ...
customer_reviews.text: Plumber installed easily. Pleasantly surprised it seemed significantly quieter than the older broken but sound insulated KitchenAid it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: Installed in minutes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it is exactly what I had before. Took it out of the box and it was installed in 20 minutes. Super quiet.
customer_reviews.author: John Belz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, easy to install, fast delivery and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not Grind Well
customer_reviews.text: For the price and HP rating, I expected better performance. Certain foods (like banana peels, less the hard stem) my old disposal handled with ease are a challenge for this one. The openings where food exits the grinding chamber are vertically-oriented narrow rectangles, whereas the disposal it replaced had openings in a saw-tooth pattern. I suspect that's where the difference lies.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Meets Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Quieter and more powerful than my previous garbage disposal. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Alice, New Haven, CT

customer_reviews.title: the best  garbage disposal ever and quiet
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the Best garbage disposal I have ever had,works great, easy to install, installed it myself and is very quiet. I would purchase this dispolal again! Purcased though Amazon, shipping fast with no problems. It has been in use for 1 year now and has never jammed, clogged, I will never buy anything but a Kitchen Aid again.
customer_reviews.author: sandra naebeck

customer_reviews.title: Efficiency.
customer_reviews.text: This is quite and efficient. Nothing is left over to gum up the works.
customer_reviews.author: John Allison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it in a week and so far all's well.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Lascola

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this disposal for two weeks: it is very powerful and quiet. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Product!
customer_reviews.text: This garbage disposal works extremely well and is exceptionally quiet. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Roger E. Hammer Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Loud Buzzing Caused by a Design Problem
customer_reviews.text: I installed the disposal and it made a loud buzzing noise. After a call to KitchenAid, they sent a repairman out to look at the problem. He isolated the buzzing to the red plastic pieces that goes around the outside. They were loose and vibrating on the internal metal part of the disposal. He removed the plastic pieces, reinstalled it, and the buzzing stopped but it was still louder than my 20 year old Kenmore that it was replacing. He told me the buzzing was a design problem and he could not fix it. I packed it up and shipped it back to Amazon for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: JimB

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow opening on quiet collar
customer_reviews.text: Over all very pleased with this disposal. My main aggrevation is the quiet collar opening is so narrow that running water has trouble flowing thru it. The stopper has a pop up opening that I prefer to have in, just for that fact. You have to really "push" the food thru the quiet collar. It is removable so I end up taking it out to put food in. But the disposal is very quiet with that collar on. Seems to grind up the food very well. It would be nice if the offered another collar with a little wider opening.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet and efficient, in fact, it's so quiet (unlike our old one), the first few times I used it, I had to check that it was on! Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Simerson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and very quiet when using! I would definitely recommend KitchenAid!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet operation
customer_reviews.text: This is the quietest disposal I've ever owned, and seems to have plenty of power. The sink stopper included with it is convenient to use and can be left in place all the time, open or closed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L

customer_reviews.title: Quietest disposal we've never heard!
customer_reviews.text: Can hardly tell if it's running. Only negative comment would be the extra size from insulation, but well worth fitting it in.
customer_reviews.author: John W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So quiet that I wondered whether it was actually working.
customer_reviews.author: MARY A. DUFFY

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Good instructions and easy installation. Quiet operation as advertised. Only negative is no power chord included. They want you to use the old one. Who wants to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Losesome

customer_reviews.title: very quiet and fast
customer_reviews.text: This unit is much quieter than the old one and I like the removable collar even if it slows water flow
customer_reviews.author: D. Clever

customer_reviews.title: Quite. Nice package. Easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and installed so I can't tell exactly how it works. However, installation was pretty easy. The hard part was getting the old one out. It purrs. Very quite. Slight vibration on the counter (I mean, slight. It has to vibrate a bit). Seems very powerful. I plugged in before install just to check it out and it sure had torque. I'll update after some significant use. This was more expensive but I really wanted a quite and powerful unit.
customer_reviews.author: Watson S. Swail

customer_reviews.title: "You can put a horse in it!"
customer_reviews.text: Quoting my contractor installing the garbage disposal. It's quiet and powerful. Great purchase, I will definitely recommend to everybody to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: RCali

customer_reviews.title: all went pretty much as expected
customer_reviews.text: all went pretty much as expected. amateur here, had a bit of trouble with a very tight connection on the outlet even though it was a replacement of an old one.
customer_reviews.author: Ben J Freedman

customer_reviews.title: Almost too quiet!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using ours for several months now. It easily handles any normal load; and it is so quiet that it is easy to walk away and leave it running! So it is best to wait there just a few seconds and turn it off as soon as it is finished. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Smooth running, fast and a efficient. No money down the drain here!
customer_reviews.author: E.Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet disposal
customer_reviews.text: This one is so quiet, I sometimes forget to turn it off. Easy to install, received in a very timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: C. E. Lewellen

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE how quiet this is!
customer_reviews.text: We had to run to the store and purchase a replacement flange kit that included the baffle in one piece in order for this to work with my sink's drain set up, but it worked out perfectly. Our kitchen is open to the living room and DH no longer has to pause the TV while I grind. The motor is quiet and the grinding is quiet; it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Terri in Jax

customer_reviews.title: and I love the removeable gasket (or whatever it's called)
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, quiet, and I love the removeable gasket (or whatever it's called).
customer_reviews.author: Lee Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Disposal
customer_reviews.text: So far, the disposal does what it is supposed to do, and it is very quiet. Installation instructions were very thorough.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Ryan-Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Aid
customer_reviews.text: Great disposal and extremely quiet. Very satisfied and would recommend highly. Chose the KItchen Aid because is was a little smaller than #1 Consumers Report article. If space us an issue this is a great dusposal
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: grinds up so small
customer_reviews.text: had old kitchen aid before and this one is much quieter. so glad I bought this one. Takes up less room than other
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS
customer_reviews.text: So quiet! It is so quiet, you wonder if it is working but it is, I've checked. Kitchen aid makes the best disposers, I would not own any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Hylton

customer_reviews.title: Great pruduct
customer_reviews.text: Nice, quite and smooth,what else do you need. I would highly recommend this product to any home owner bedding a upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as represented; powerful, quiet.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my dead disposal with this one. Installation was easy enough. Disposal is quiet and has no problem doing its job.
customer_reviews.author: stuinpeoria

customer_reviews.title: GREAT garbage disposal
customer_reviews.text: Did a ton of research on garbage disposals, and this one came highly recommended. Very quiet, very powerful, and just works great. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Pidgeon

product_meta.title: KitchenAid Continuous Feed Garbage Disposal
product_meta.description: This 3/4 hp continuous feed food waste disposer gives you a powerful solution to everyday disposing challenges. This 40-ounce food waste disposer has a 3/4 hp motor that rotates at 1725 rpms for efficient performance. Two-stage grinding and sound insulation help enhance the performance.
feature_bullets: Continuous feed allows for quick cleanup after meals
Motor rotates at 1725 rpm for effective grinding
Sound seal technology helps you maintain a quiet kitchen
